title: Forest Dump
description: Forest Dump is a casual roguelike game that takes you on a unique adventure through a quirky and polluted woodland. As a clever and resourceful fox, your mission is to clean up your corrupted forest home by flipping cards to uncover mysteries, face off against trash monsters, and collect powerful weapons to aid in your journey. Combining card-flipping mechanics with deckbuilding elements, this game offers a strategic adventure full of surprises. Will you be able to clean up the pollution and restore the forest to its former glory? Jump into Forest Dump and find out!
